adumbrate: [verb] to foreshadow or to outline without clear details
amass: [verb] to gather or collect in large amounts
footle: [verb] to waste time or act foolishly
increment: [noun] an amount a value changes by, especially a fixed amount
splenetic: [adj.] cranky, touchy, in a bad mood
trope: [noun] a common theme or device in storytelling
